config.dogslie.prop.dogsSpawnLying.desc: Do dogs spawn into the world lying down if they are already sitting.
config.dogslie.prop.dogsSpawnLying.name: Dogs Spawn Lying
config.dogslie.prop.enabledPoses.desc: Poses for lying down that are enabled. If the mod can't find compatible poses, it will randomly pick one set.
config.dogslie.prop.enabledPoses.name: Enabled Lying Poses
config.dogslie.prop.getsUpFor.desc:
Who the dog gets up for?
Accepts: NOBODY, OWNER, PLAYERS, ANY_LIVING_ENTITY
config.dogslie.prop.getsUpFor.name: Gets Up For...
config.dogslie.prop.playSoundWhenLieStat: Play a bark/whine when the dog stands up/lies down?
Play Sound When Lie State Changes
config.dogslie.prop.rangeBeforeGettingUp: Range for target to get to dog before dog gets up (in blocks)
config.dogslie.prop.timeBeforeLie.desc: Time to spend sitting (in ticks) before dogs lie down.
config.dogslie.prop.timeBeforeLie.name: Time Before Lying
